markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 10"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Deathless Light](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1452)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Strength of Thousands</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Catalyst" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=396" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #172: Secrets of the Temple City](/Sources.aspx?ID=102) pg. 85</row>

**Price** 165 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>envision</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This glowing piece of flesh increases the spell level of a spell with the [light](/Traits.aspx?ID=100) trait by 1 (maximum 7) when determining whether the spell's light will shine in magical darkness or [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) a [darkness](/Traits.aspx?ID=39) spell.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Deathless Light
